move

public boolean move(Cardinal cardinal)
             throws PositionOutOfBoundsException
The method try to move content from a Tile to other tile in the board in the direction Cardinal says.

Parameters:
from - Point where the movement starts.
cardinal - direction of movement
Returns:
True if was able to move, false if not

PositionOutOfBoundsException
